downloadTitle: Get Ready for Basic Auth Deprecation in Exchange Online
downloadDescription: Presentation from the Microsoft Exchange Community (MEC) Technical Airlift - September 13-14, 2022

downloadFile.name: Get Ready for Basic Auth Deprecation in Exchange Online.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/a/6/fa66d91d-9ceb-4b5f-acf4-fca9ee176c87/Get Ready for Basic Auth Deprecation in Exchange Online.pdf

detailsSection:
Once upon a time, back in 2019 we said we would turn off Basic auth in Exchange Online. In 2021, we started doing it. By the start of 2022 we had already disabled it for millions of tenants, but we’re not done yet. This session will give you the inside story on how we are doing it, how it’s going, what we built to help us along the way, where we're going, and for the first time, we will share some details on our progress.

Recording of presentation by Greg Taylor is at https://youtu.be/Db_OYLXJQF4.
detailsSection_file_name: Get Ready for Basic Auth Deprecation in Exchange Online.pdf
